title.text: Field data collection integrated with Open Street Map Editing

services.title: Open Street Map Tags
services.desc: Use Excel to author a survey including standard OpenStreetMap tags

services.title: Points of Interest
services.desc: Create new Points of Interest and load into OpenStreetMap. Simply drop a pin to create a POI and add tags

services.title: Collect Surveys
services.desc: Securely collect your survey results in OpenMapKit Server. Save your edits and upload your public data to OpenStreetMap

how_works.title: How it works
how_works.text: OpenMapKit launches directly from OpenDataKit when the OSM question type is enabled in a standard survey. Simply include OSM questions and tags in your survey to collect information on OSM in the field. OpenMapKit confirms to the XForm standard and allows complex questions and logic right in the survey form.

omk_features.title: Create a Survey
omk_features.description: Use Excel to author a new survey. Include standard OpenStreetMap tags in your forms

omk_features.title: Open OMK App
omk_features.description: Use the app to answer questions in the field. Drop a pin to create new Points of Interest or update information already on the map

omk_features.title: Implement Survey
omk_features.description: Securely collect your survey results in FormHub or OpenMapKit Server. Save your edits and upload your public data to OpenStreetMap
